Class View

  • java.lang.Object
    • View

  • public class View
extends Object
    Class View is a main program for displaying a Viewable object on the screen. The object is read in from a file containing a Viewable object in serialized form. The program polls the file periodically, and if the file has changed, the program re-reads and re-displays the object.

    The View program includes a "File" menu with menu items for saving the drawing in a PNG file, saving the drawing in a PostScript file, and quitting the program.

    The View program can display instances of the following classes:

    • Drawing
    • Plot

    Usage: java View file
